website_summaries.verdict: A versatile collection of 14 matte and glamorous shimmer eyeshadows.
pros: Includes ultra-matte, duo chrome, and metallic finishes to create a myriad of looks
The texture is smooth and the pigment is very blendable
We suggest going light with the shimmer shades, as a little goes a long way
cons: As noted with all of these palettes, quite a bit of product kicks up when you dip your brush in

customer_reviews.title: Like throwing my money away
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY ANGRY RIGHT NOW! I recently ordered this and was SO EXCITED to receive it. My excitement ended in ABSOLUTE HORROR when I opened my package to discover that my palette was all but COMPLETELY SMASHED!! EYESHADOW WENT EVERYWHERE!! SO DISAPPOINTED. I threw it in the trash and in not even sure if I want to bother to reorder it. I. Afraid of the SAME result . Not a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Podratz

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This arrived all smashed and in poor condition. My daughter was very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B.

customer_reviews.title: Shadows might not survive shipping
customer_reviews.text: I bought this palette as a gift. The second they opened it, one of the shadows (sultry) happened to have crumbled completely and was all over the place. Another was slightly damaged as well. Photos added for proof
customer_reviews.author: Sam M

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Little disappointed with the handling of this product. I’ve heard great things about this product so I ordered it to come across when delivered most of the powder was recked by time it came to me.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Broken pallet, eyeshadow everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed. I have the Modern Renaissance pallet and love it. I've been wanting the Soft Glam pallet and got it on the Prime Day sale. When I opened it to use it there was eye shadow everywhere and broken color blocks. I will be returning this item today.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Kukolla

customer_reviews.title: the best palette ever
customer_reviews.text: the best palette ever, perfect for profesional make up, easy to blend. the best colors, u need only this palette for every occasion. i have the renascence palette, with this you don't need nothing more
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Soto

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken twice.
customer_reviews.text: Love the palette and ABH but both the original and the replacement that I ordered had broken eyeshadows. After the second one I just decided to return for cash and buy it in person from Ulta instead.
customer_reviews.author: FRL

customer_reviews.title: Came broken :(
customer_reviews.text: Came with two shadows completely smashed and the whole thing is all messy and broken from it.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent prime shopper

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shades
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful neutrals and some shiny shades. Love the rose gold. The double sided brush is perfect for highlighting and filling in the lid. Comes double wrapped. Better to buy on Amazon with free shipping than Sephora. Will buy again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE ABH
customer_reviews.text: I have both the ABH soft glam and renaissance palettes. This one is by far my favorite. I use at least one of the colors daily. My favorite is the satin light shades that I can use a bit of setting spray on my brush and spread on the inner 1/3 - 1/2 of my eyelid. Gosh! so flattering. You will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Ybarra

customer_reviews.title: Love this soft glam pallet!
customer_reviews.text: Love this eyeshadow pallet!! I’ve recently gotten better at eye makeup after countless YouTube tutorials and this soft glam pallet makes me excited to do my make up everyday. I love the color options!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Tad disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am a bit disappointed, when I received the palette two shadows were shattered and there was dust everywhere... Some of the pans were a bit loose... The rest of the shadows have great colors and are easy to blend.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pallet. Very pigmented almost too pigmented and easy to blend. Pic of me wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Ilovebling

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pallets
customer_reviews.text: Love this palette. I use all the shades. I am super happy with the combination of shades.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came broken twice
customer_reviews.text: I think the colors on this are beautiful however I’m giving it one star because the first one came with multiple shadows shattered and my replacement then came the same way. It’s highly disappointing that they don’t take the time to ship these better so that they don’t break.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Foster

customer_reviews.title: Came with broken shades
customer_reviews.text: Came without any air bag/foam or any protection. No wonder why most of the reviews say they got broken palettes.
customer_reviews.author: Orange_OwO

customer_reviews.title: I should have listened
customer_reviews.text: It was super broken, like how many people have described theirs when it arrived. I'm so disappointed; the colors are beautiful but it's not a strong start to using it to have to be broken :(
customer_reviews.author: Renae

customer_reviews.title: A must!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite Anastasia Beverly Hills Palettes! A must for your collection!
customer_reviews.author: David Ambos

customer_reviews.title: This product was delivered late and damaged!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered damaged. This was supposed to be a birthday present and now it will be a month late.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Browning

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this today, but it arrived broken. I'm so dissapointed..
customer_reviews.author: Rubi Mata

customer_reviews.title: about the pallet
customer_reviews.text: This pallet is a bit powdery... love the colors though! One pan came broken, but I fixed it with some alcohol.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: All together it was a nice palette, but two of the square eyeshadow pans were all messed up and I had to fix another
customer_reviews.author: vanessa

customer_reviews.title: N/A
customer_reviews.text: The product was delivered damaged and multiple eyeshadows were broken up and the whole thing was a mess. I am going to be returning it for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Breen

customer_reviews.title: Crushed
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my palette suffered the same fate as many of these reviewers. Rose pink and sultry completely crushed and falling out everywhere. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Got for a friend for Christmas and she loved it
customer_reviews.author: David Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: One eyeshadow was broken. This was xmas gift so wasn’t happy to go through the hassle of sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken what a mess
customer_reviews.text: Product came with broken eyeshadow, was reordered and the second one came broken as well. 🤦‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: danielle lipscomb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shadow pallet
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors for every skin tone,long lasting, blends like a dream
customer_reviews.author: Paula J.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Case came with dirt on it, and two colors were damaged. Arrived in poor condition
customer_reviews.author: G N

customer_reviews.title: Broken palette
customer_reviews.text: I paid for a new eyeshadow palette but came broken
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product
customer_reviews.text: I opened package and eyeshadow was all over the palette.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long to try this?!
customer_reviews.text: Who knew eye shadow could be so wonderful! I purchased this on prime day. I love it! The blend ability is amazing! The colors are perfect for day time use and easily transition to a night time look. I will definitely be using only this line from here on out
customer_reviews.author: amaham

customer_reviews.title: beautiful but cracked
customer_reviews.text: one of my shadows came crack, and another was chipped, but seems to have happened in shipment, also due to the softness of the pigments its not very surprising, so i kept it anyways because product still useable, blends like a charm, beautiful colors, overall Love!
customer_reviews.author: kat b isak

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my significant other and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

product_meta.title: Anastasia Beverly Hills - Eyeshadow Palette - Soft Glam
feature_bullets: An essential neutral palette that will take you from day to night, featuring 14 shades ranging from warm and cool mattes to glamorous shimmers.
Palette includes 9 ultra-matte and 5 metallic finishes
The full-pigment formula delivers high color payoff and buildable intensity
Includes a dual-ended brush and a large mirror housed inside travel-friendly packaging
